cards.name: Preet Shihn
cards.title: The Anniversary Malady
cards.description: In the year after my husband died, every memory triggered flashbacks: Blackberry ice cream. A song on the radio. The angle of sunlight.

cards.name: Zeynep Tufekci
cards.title: Equifax’s Maddening Unaccountability
cards.description: I don’t doubt the company regrets what happened. But I don’t think it cares that much either.
